items.sentence: That's not the main reason Tom had to do that.
Tom will likely be too scared to say anything.
Tom and Mary are very proud of their children.
Tom and Mary are going to name their son John.
Tom and Mary are both very smart, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are both quite rich, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are both pretty shy, aren't they?
I wouldn't have let Tom drive if I'd been you.
I told Tom I wanted him to come here tomorrow.
I still wonder why Tom won't let Mary do that.
